maqras.text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) leukatamkeung neam nei mcheasa robsa anak da utdongk utdam choh
trong chea anak del ban bangkeut( avei teangoasa) ruoch trong ban riebcham aoy mean lokkhan samoromy
ning chea anak del ban kamnt veasanea ning phdal kar changaoulobangheanh
ning chea anak del bandoh roukkhcheate baitng krobbebyeang
kraoyomk trong ban thveu aoy vea klaycha chambaeng snguot pnrkhmaw
yeung nung sautr( kompir kuor an) aoy anak( mou ham meat)sdab haey anak nung min phe l ch vea laey
leuklengte avei del a l laoh mean chetnea( aoy anak phe l ch) bonnaoh . pitabrakd nasa trong doeng nouv avei del leatatradeang ning leakkambang
haey yeung nung samruol aoy anak nouv meakra da ngeayosruol(krob kechchakar)
dau che neah chaur anak kraenromluk choh brasenbae kar kraenromluk noh mean phalobrayoch
anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh nung ttuol yk kar kraen romluk
bo nde anak del min kaotakhlach a l laoh nung kech chenhpi vea
kuchea anak del nung trauv chaul tow knong pheu l ng nork yeang thomtheng
banteabmk ke min ach slab haeyka min ach rsa daoy ngeayosruol der nowknong nork noh
anak del saamatakhluon( pi brakear shi ri k) pitchea ttuol ban chokchy
ning anak del ban romluk neam nei mcheasa robsa ke haeyning brate b tde sa la t
phtoytowvinh puok anak bercha sraleanh karorsanow knong lokey towvinh
thveitbette thngai barlok vea brasaer cheang ning amt kadaoy
pitabrakd nasa rueng nih ku mean cheng nowknong kompir moun
dauchchea kompir robsa ai pr hi m ning mou sa cheadaem
tae damnoeng nei thngai barlok ban mokadl anak( mou ham meat) haey ryy now
now thngai noh tukmoukh( robsa puok kmean chomnue) ku mean pheap ameasa
rovl yeang khlang ning nueyoht bamphot
puokke nung chaul knong pheu l ng nork da sen kdaw
puokke nung trauv ke aoy phoektuk da kdaw bamphot
kmean chamneiahar na samreab puokke krawpi banlea ning cheatepoul
del vea nung min thveu aoy thomtheat ning min thveu aoy bat kar se rk khlean noh laey
now thngai noh der tukmoukh( robsa banda anak mean chomnue)brakb daoy kdei rikreay
daoysaarte puokke penh chetd champoh kar broengobreng robsa khluon ( nowknong lokey)
nowknong thansuokr da khpasatradet
del nowknong vea noh puokke minlyy peakyasaamdei itabrayoch laey
now tinoh mean braphp tuk del haur
now tinoh der mean kre khpasa
ning kev del ban riebcham toukdeak chea se r ch
ning khnaeykaey rieb dak cheachuor
ning kamrealoprom krobbebyeang del ban kral santhung ruoch chea se r ch
haey tae puokke minban pichearna champoh satv audth te ryytha vea trauv ban ke bangkeut yeang dauch me d ch
ning meul tow mekh tae vea trauv ban ke leuk aoy khpasa laeng yeang dauch me d ch
ning meul tow phnom teanglay tae vea trauv ban ke baohphcheab yeang rungmoam dauch me d ch
ning meul tow phendei tae vea trauv ban ke ponlea t santhung yeang dauch me d ch der
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) kraenromluk choh karpit anak kreante chea anak del kraenromluk bonnaoh
anak poum men chea anakabrae amnach phdachkar towleu puokke laey
leuklengte anaknea del ngeak chenh ning kmean chomnue bonnaoh
a l laoh nung thveutearounakamm ke nouv tearounakamm muoy yeang thngonthngor bamphot
pitabrakd nasa kar vilotralb robsa puokke ku mokkan yeung temnak kt
banteabmk pitabrakd nasa kar chomnoumchomreah robsa puokke kuchea tuonati robsa yeung
a l laoh sbath nung pel tiebaphlu
ning yb teang db( db thngai dambaung nei khe hsaou l he chcheah)
ning thngai kt kou ning thngai sesa
ning peloyb nowpel del vea kanlong phot tow
tae kar sbath nowknong rueng teangnih min krobkrean samreab anak del svengoyl te ryy
tae anak( mou ham meat) min bankheunh teryy mcheasa robsa anak ban thveu dauch me d ch champoh krom a d
ning kolosampnth ai r m del mean kamleang khlangokla ning mean saamnng khpasa
delke mintean ban bangkeut dauch vea nowknong phendei nih
ning krom sa mou ddel ban dabthm nowknong chrolongophnom(thveuchea lomnow dthan)
haeyning hvie r aon del mean polteahean pongrung amnach robsa ke noh
puokke chea puok del ban bampean now leu phendei nih
haey puokke themtang ban bangk vineasakamm yeang chraen now leu vea tiet phng noh
dau che neah mcheasa robsa anak ban tomleak leu puokke nouv tearounakamm da chhucheab
pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anakchea anak del khleameul ( real tongveu nei khnhom robsa trong)
rie mnoussaalok nowpel del mcheasa robsa ke ban sak lbong ke daoy ban leukatamkeung ning bratan nie k meat dl ke noh ke nung niyeay tha mcheasa robsakhnhom chea anak del ban leukatamkeung khnhom
bo nde nowpel del trong sakalbong ke daoy ban kbet kbie t nouv leaphosakkar robsa trong champoh ke noh ke nung niyeay tha mcheasa robsakhnhom thveu aoy khnhom ttuol nouv pheap ameasa
te. phtoytowvinh puok anak kmean chetd sabborsa champoh kaun kamprea laey
haey puok anak minban chomrounh knea knong kar phdal chamneiahar dl anak kreikr laey
haey puok anak sai keromorotk daoy pheap lopholn
haey puok anak themtang sraleanh tropy sa mb tde huosa heto tiet phng
te. nowpel del phendei trauv ban ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlang
haey mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) ban mokadl haey mea la ai kat kaban mokadl daoy tam rieb cheachuor der
haey now thngai noh nork cheu han nam trauv ban ke neamk . now thngai noh der mnoussa lok nung phnheak rluk . tae ke meankar phnheak rluk yeang dauch me d ch
ke nung niyeay tha ao anichchea khluon khnhom aey. khnhom kuorte ban sang ampeula samreab khluon khnhom( knong lokey)
dau che neah now thngai noh kmean norna mneak ach thveutearounakamm dauch tearounakamm robsa trong laey
haeyka kmean norna ach chng dauch chamnng robsa trong der
ao prolung del nungonr
chaur anak vilotralb tow rk mcheasa robsa anak vinh daoy kdei rikreay ning ylprom pi trong choh
haey chaur anak chaul tow knongchamnaom khnhom robsa yeung(del sang ampeula) choh
haey chaur anak chaul thansuokr robsa yeung choh
